org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http

Class DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.AbstractMessageContainer<HttpMessage>
      • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.AbstractHttpMessageContainer
        • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.DefaultMultipleHttpMessagesContainer
          • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpMessageContainer, MultipleHttpMessagesContainer, SelectableHttpMessagesContainer, MessageContainer<HttpMessage>, MultipleMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>, SelectableMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>, SingleMessageContainer<HttpMessage>

    public class DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer
extends DefaultMultipleHttpMessagesContainer
implements SelectableHttpMessagesContainer
    A default implementation of a SelectableHttpMessagesContainer.

    Note: Users of this class should provide list of HttpMessages that are read as needed (for example, from DB) to avoid keeping the HttpMessages in memory or alternatively use SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer.

    Since:
    2.3.0
    See Also:
    SingleHttpMessageContainer, SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer(String name, Component component)
      Constructs a DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer with no HttpMessages and with the given container name and component.
      DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer(String name, Component component, List<HttpMessage> httpMessages)
      Constructs a DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer with no selected messages and with the given container name and component and contained httpMessages.
      DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer(String name, Component component, List<HttpMessage> httpMessages, List<HttpMessage> selectedHttpMessages)
      Constructs a DefaultSelectableHttpMessagesContainer with the given container name and component, contained httpMessages and selected selectedHttpMessages.

        component - the GUI component of the container
        httpMessages - the contained HTTP messages, null or empty list if none
        selectedHttpMessages - the selected HTTP messages, null or empty list if none
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given name or component is null.

      • getSelectedMessages

        public List<HttpMessage> getSelectedMessages()
        Description copied from interface: SelectableMessagesContainer
        Returns all the selected messages or an empty List if none.

        No assumptions should be made on the actual implementation type of the List returned by this method (for example, it might be unmodifiable or its elements lazy loaded).

        Note: Extra care should be taken when getting the messages from the list since it might return null which indicate that an error occurred while getting a message (for example, failed to read a persisted message).

        Specified by:
        getSelectedMessages in interface SelectableMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>
        Returns:
        a List with all the selected messages, never null.
